explains: n. 歌词；抒情诗（lyric 的复数）

sentences.en: His face contorts as he screams out the lyrics.
sentences.cn: 当他大声朗读这些抒情诗时，脸都变形了。

sentences.en: The lyrics of the song are embarrassingly banal.
sentences.cn: 那首歌的歌词庸俗得让人尴尬。

sentences.en: He's written a few overtly political lyrics over the years.
sentences.cn: 他几年来写了几篇政治性明显的歌词。
